products.name: Wireless Headphones
products.description: Noise-cancelling over-ear headphones with 30 hours battery life. Designed for immersive listening with seamless Bluetooth connectivity and all-day comfort. Suitable for work, travel, and everyday music consumption.
products.productPraise: Big sound. Zero wires. Feel every beat like the artist intended. These headphones don’t just play music — they pull you into it.

products.name: Denim Jacket
products.description: Classic blue denim jacket made with durable fabric. Suitable for all seasons and easy to layer with casual or semi-formal outfits.

products.name: Atomic Habits
products.description: A practical self-improvement book focused on building positive habits and breaking negative ones through small, consistent changes.
products.productPraise: A quiet life-changer. Read it once, and your thinking never really goes back to default mode.

products.name: Smart Fitness Watch
products.description: Fitness smartwatch featuring heart-rate monitoring, sleep tracking, activity insights, and a long-lasting 7-day battery life.
products.productPraise: Your health, decoded on your wrist. Smart, subtle, and always one step ahead.

products.name: Noise Cancelling Earbuds
products.description: True wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation, fast charging support, and a compact, lightweight design.
products.productPraise: Tiny size. Serious power. Shut out the noise and stay locked into your world.

products.name: Mouse
products.description: This is a good mouse, guarantee for more than 2 years, effective, flexible.
